headline: Broadridge Schedules Webcast and Conference Call to Review Second Quarter Fiscal Year 2026 Results on February 3, 2026
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:BR) is scheduled to release its financial results for the second quarter of fiscal year 2026 on Tuesday, February 3, 2026. Broadridge will host a webcast and conference call to discuss those results at 8:30 a.m. ET on February 3, 2026. Tim Gokey, Chief Executive Officer, and Ashima Ghei, Chief Financial Officer, will participate on the call.
